original_solution_mapping.L1: Yes RSVP responses are 200 x 83% = <<200*83*.01=166>>166 guests.
original_solution_mapping.L2: No RSVP responses are 200 x 9% = <<200*9*.01=18>>18 guests.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Guests who did not respond at all are 200 - 184 = <<200-184=16>>16.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2889.
    Returns: the number of guests who did not respond at all.
    """
    # L1
    total_guests = 200 # 200 guests
    yes_rsvp_percent_num = 83 # 83% of the guests
    percent_factor = 0.01 # WK
    yes_responses = total_guests * yes_rsvp_percent_num * percent_factor

    # L2
    no_rsvp_percent_num = 9 # 9% of the guests
    no_responses = total_guests * no_rsvp_percent_num * percent_factor

    # L3
    total_responded_guests = yes_responses + no_responses

    # L4
    unresponded_guests = total_guests - total_responded_guests

    # FA
    answer = unresponded_guests
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Yes RSVP responses are {total_guests} x {yes_rsvp_percent_num}% = <<{total_guests}*{yes_rsvp_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={yes_responses}>>{yes_responses} guests.
No RSVP responses are {total_guests} x {no_rsvp_percent_num}% = <<{total_guests}*{no_rsvp_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={no_responses}>>{no_responses} guests.
Guests who did not respond at all are {total_guests} - {total_responded_guests} = <<{total_guests}-{total_responded_guests}={unresponded_guests}>>{unresponded_guests}.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Yes RSVP responses are 200 x 83% = <<200*83*0.01=166>>166 guests.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: No RSVP responses are 200 x 9% = <<200*9*0.01=18>>18 guests.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Guests who did not respond at all are 200 - 101 = <<200-101=99>>99.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'yes_rsvp_percent_num' (value: 83) was used instead of 'yes_responses' (value: 166.0).
